t: Moving your paywall to the edge with Amazon CloudFront | Amazon Web Services
s: February 21, 2023 - To support a paywall, CloudFront needs to know whether a user is authorized before serving content. Authorized users receive the full content item from cache. Unauthorized users receive only a preview. CloudFront does not create the different content versions.
